issue.title: [C++] AsofJoin multiple keys and types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17412](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17412). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, AsofJoin supports a single (column) key of a limited set of types. This issue will extend the support to multiple keys and types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17412?focusedCommentId=17601994) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13880
